about.embed.description:
Hey! I'm **{{{ name }}}**, an easy-to-use and featureful bot for Discord.
I provide everything a community needs, bring needed utility content and keep your place fun!

I was made by **iDroid#4441** using [node.js](https://nodejs.org) ({{{ node }}}) with the API wrapper [discord.js](https://discord.js.org) ({{{ discord }}}).
You can check my commands using the `{{{ defaultPrefix }}}help` command.
Star my repository and contribute to my development on [GitHub](https://github.com/iDroid27210/homer)!
You can also vote for me on [DiscordBots.org]({{{ voteURL }}}).

You can join the support server if you wanna get some assistance, just type `{{{ defaultPrefix }}}support` and follow the link.
Sincerly, iDroid.
about.embed.footer: Get statistics using {{{ prefix }}}stats! - Last reboot

dashboard.introducing.p:
Finally an all-in-one alternative to all these Discord bots!
Homer provides you moderation, utility and fun features to bridge your needs.
Entertain your community using the (almost) unique telephone feature!
dashboard.get.p:
‚Ä¢ In order to get Homer on your server, click on the ¬´ Invite on Discord ¬ª button at the top-right of your screen.
‚Ä¢ Choose the server where Homer will be then click on Authorize.
‚Ä¢ Start to use Homer on Discord by typing h:help on your chat!
dashboard.features.moderation.p:
Manage your server with Homer moderation commands.
Homer also provides an advanced moderation log which traces all moderation actions ran using Homer.
It is highly customizable to offer a perfect compatibility with localization specifications.
dashboard.features.utility.p:
Homer provides utility features such as a lookup command which find information about invites or IDs on Discord,
a command to check the status of an user of the Discord Bans list,
some miscallaneous features such as a Google searcher, a translator or a weather finder.
dashboard.features.multilingual.p:
Homer can support every language of this planet, for the moment only English and French are translated.
If you want to see Homer translated into your language, you can participate to the translation by contacting an owner on Discord.
If you find any error in a translation, don't hesitate to report it using the h:feedback command.
dashboard.features.telephone.p:
Homer has an (almost) unique telephone feature. You can communicate in live with other servers having set-up the feature.
To get it running, generate your phone number using the h:number command,
then set-up a telephone channel using the h:telephone command.
dashboard.error.p:
Something wrong happened!
We are fixing that, please come back later!
You can join the support server to get assistance.
dashboard.footer.discordProperty: The Discord logo is the property of
donators.text:
Donations are very useful, they can be used for hosting, API services such as Google or DarkSky, paying third-part workers, etc...
If you wanna donate and contribute to Homer's development,
you can use my **PayPal.me** page by [clicking here](https://paypal.me/ibotandidroid).

guide.welcome:
üîñ **Welcome to the Homer guide**
You can get help on using main Homer features.
Please react with the emoji that represents the feature you wanna get help for.
guide.‚òé:
‚òé **How to set-up Homer telephone**
1) Define the telephone channel using `{{{ prefix }}}setphone`.
2) Get your number using `{{{ prefix }}}number`.
3) If you don't want to appear on the phonebook, run `{{{ prefix }}}phonebook switch`.
4) Find numbers to call using `{{{ prefix }}}phonebook` or ask your friends to give theirs.
5) Start calling using `{{{ prefix }}}call`!

**Tip 1:** If you want to reset your number, use `{{{ prefix }}}number reset`
**Tip 2:** If you want to blacklist a number, run the command `{{{ prefix }}}phonebook blacklist <number>`.

‚òé Thanks for using Homer telephone! Your telephone number is `{{{ number }}}`.
üîñ You appear by default on the phonebook. If you do not want to appear on, please run the `{{{ defaultPrefix }}}phonebook switch` command (`MANAGE_GUILD` permission required).

vote.title: üó≥ Votes for **Homer**:
vote.embedDescription:
You can vote on **Discord Bot List** to contribute to Homer's development, [click here](https://discordbots.org/bot/{{{ botID }}}/vote) and login with Discord in order to vote.
You'll receive a message saying your vote is taken into account.

**üìä Statistics**
- **{{{ votersCount }}}** people voted for Homer.
- **{{{ votesCount }}}** total votes have been registered this month.
- You voted **{{{ userCount }}}** times this month.

**üèÜ Top voters of this month**
{{{ topVoters }}}
